ability.Fiery Roar: Increases the power of Fire-type moves by 50%. The Fire-type moves cause x2 effect to Water-type Pokemon instead of x0.5.
ability.Venomous Strike: Has a 30% chance to poison the attacker when hit by a contact move.

Blazing Breath.effect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

Dragon Fang.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

Goat Rush.effect: Increases the user's Speed by 1 stage after use.

Serpent Venom.effect: Has a 50% chance to poison the target. If the target is already poisoned, deals double damage.
